document_data.name: Raven
document_data.mainbody: '''Raven''' was a [[horse]] belonging to [[Vala Thorsdotter]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Raven was a large and strong black stallion.{{Cite dragon/281/Rogues Gallery: Heroes of the Summoning|83}}
document_data.History:
Raven was descended from [[Sable (horse)|Sable]], a mare of which [[Melegaunt Tanthul]] had apparently been quite fond{{Cite dragon/281/Rogues Gallery: Heroes of the Summoning|81}}

In the {{yearlinkName|1371}}, Raven was taken to [[Evereska]]
